meanings.definition: To raise (a bet) after an opponent has raised.
meanings.sent1: She reraises the bet, showing confidence in her hand.
meanings.sent2: He reraises the stakes, trying to intimidate the other players.
meanings.sent3: The player reraises, making the others at the table nervous.
meanings.sent4: With a sly smile, she reraises the bet, signaling she has a strong hand.
meanings.sent5: His reraise is bold and calculated, putting pressure on his opponents.

meanings.definition: To raise (a bet) again after having already raised.
meanings.sent1: After raising once, he reraises to push his opponents out of the hand.
meanings.sent2: She confidently reraises, indicating she has a powerful hand.
meanings.sent3: The player reraises, hoping to bluff his way to victory.
meanings.sent4: His reraise is unexpected, catching the other players off guard.
meanings.sent5: With a strategic move, she reraises the bet, asserting her dominance at the table.
